file_content.text: Last one. Place'll burn pretty.
We never thought we'd be the sort to bomb historical sites.
Detonators set. Your funeral pyre is ready, sir.
The last of the detonators is set. The honor is yours.
The yield is sufficient. Nothing will survive the explosion.
Why don't you step away from the bomb? Won't do either of us any good.
Say the word, sir.
Should I call it in?
SIS bosses want Legate here, they can give us a little time to chat. Glad to see you again.
I didn't expect to find you on Corellia. Sightseeing?
Ardun Kothe. Why are you here?
The boys upstairs got a tip you were here. They needed someone to lead a team, I wanted to come in person.
When the Shadow Arsenal detonated, I wasn't sure you survived.
I'm glad you're alright.
Took some doing, but I managed. Been handling paperwork, 'til they got the tip you were on Corellia.
I let you live back at the Shadow Arsenal, "sir." You repay me by hunting me down?
You've made a big mistake.
When they got a tip you were on Corellia, I figured better me than someone else.
I did you wrong, and you let me go. You have anything to say before we bring you in?
Remember Hunter? He's alive--he was after the Shadow Arsenal, and he's why I'm here now. He's playing us against each other.
You've been conned.
This isn't really the place.
I was merciful once. Not again.
Don't try my patience.
The rest of you step out.
Sir?
Maybe check in with Wheel.
I can't do that, sir.
You can and you will. I'll be right here, son.
I worked with Hunter a long time, and I thought he was a good man. Still can't prove anything was wrong.
But there's more than the usual going on, ain't there?
I can't explain everything now. I need the outside world to think I'm dead--can you do that?
Please, trust me on this one.
Set the detonator. Thing went off early; sometimes they do.
And Legate? SIS needs more like you.
We don't have much time, but there's an organization called the Star Cabal. They don't like Sith, and they don't like Jedi.
I'll tell you the full story.
Strange thing is, I believe you. But now we're in this together.
I let you burn this place down, tell my team you're crisped... these people become my enemy, too.
I'll take any allies I can get.
Any help is appreciated.
Then we're partners again.
When the others find out you've helped me....
Will you get in trouble?
I'm the last person you should worry about.
This is a delicate operation. Just don't interfere.
Stay out of my way.
I won't cause you problems.
You're a fine agent, Legate. Set off the bomb and I'll spread the word.
None of your concern.
Too late for that. If Imperial Intelligence were still around, I'd say it's a shame--we need more like you on the other side.
Don't move! Hawkins to chief--target acquired.
Down on the ground. SIS wants you alive, but I really don't.
I didn't know the Republic was still after me.
This is a surprise.
Don't be cocky.
I don't want to fight you. Tell me what this is about.
Let's talk this through.
You're Cipher Nine. You murdered the Eagle. Made it easy for the Imps to pick off his followers one by one.
Probably would've gotten my cell, too, but the SIS found us first. Said we had a common enemy, despite our "ideological differences."
What brings you to Corellia? Don't tell me someone tipped you off.
How did you find me?
People with grudges keep coming after me. On Voss, on Belsavis--almost like you're being played.
I keep hearing that story.
You're surprised a lot of people want you dead? After everything you've done?
Someone sent us your name, your face--that's all I need for revenge.
The people who informed on me aren't your allies. They're manipulating this war.
We should be on the same side.
Surrender, and you can tell someone all about it from your cell.
This isn't just about the Eagle, is it? What was your name again?
You have a personal grudge.
Neyla Hawkins. My sister's one of the people you destroyed--just another name on a very long list.
Fair enough. [Attack]
Lucky the SIS has few scruples when it comes to recruitment.
You're former terrorists.
I don't like them much, either--but they got the call you were here. Guess the tip was right.
Swarm on my location. Moving to subdue.
Guess there's nothing to discuss.
Swarm! Swarm!
There's more going on than you know. Stay out of it.
Walk away from this.
There's a lot going on. You should still know better.
Now you're alone. [Attack]
But there's no system for you to change anymore. All agents, close on my position.
All agents--swarm!
That's all I need. [Attack]
